snippet: While the drug, crenezumab, did not slow progression of the disease over all, at the highest doses it seemed to delay a decline in mental ability in patients with mild Alzheimer’s.
abstract: Roche reports mixed results in its latest trial of Alzheimer's drug crenezumab.
lead_paragraph: While the drug, crenezumab, did not slow progression of the disease over all, at the highest doses it seemed to delay a decline in mental ability in patients with mild Alzheimer’s.

headline.main: Roche Reports Mixed Results in Trial of an Alzheimer’s Drug
headline.print_headline: Mixed Results for Roche in Alzheimer’s Drug Trial
